classroom.name: root
classroom.style: --input-background-color: rgba(25, 32, 45, 0.1); --main-background-color: #F4F6F8; --main-background-color2: white; --main-background-color3: rgba(89,100,224,0.1); --main-background-color3-hover: rgba(89,100,224,0.35); --main-h2-color: #19202D; --main-icon-color: #6E8098; --main-text-color2: #5964E0; --main-text-color4: #6E8098; display: none;
